name: mithril-interactive-tutorial
description: Step-by-step lessons on using the Mithril MVC framework

scripts.tutorial: npm run clean-build; npm run make-directories; npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-html && npm run copy-lessons; npm run watch-js & npm run watch-stylus & npm run browser-sync
scripts.watch-js: watchify --verbose -t stringify -t coffeeify src/app.coffee src/lesson5.1/app.coffee src/lesson5.2/app.coffee src/lesson5.3/app.coffee src/lesson5.4/app.coffee -p [factor-bundle -o build/bundle.js -o build/lesson5.1/bundle.js -o build/lesson5.2/bundle.js -o build/lesson5.3/bundle.js -o build/lesson5.4/bundle.js] -o build/common.js

author: pelonpelon
